
{{alias}}
    Regular expression to parse a regular expression string.

    Regular expression strings should be escaped.

    Examples
    --------
    > var bool = {{alias}}.test( '/^beep$/' )
    true
    > bool = {{alias}}.test( '/boop' )
    false

    // Escape regular expression strings:
    > bool = {{alias}}.test( '/^\/([^\/]+)\/(.*)$/' )
    false
    > bool = {{alias}}.test( '/^\\/([^\\/]+)\\/(.*)$/' )
    true

    See Also
    --------
